com.guardtime.container.verification.policy

Class DefaultVerificationPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.container.verification.policy.DefaultVerificationPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VerificationPolicy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InternalVerificationPolicy

    public class DefaultVerificationPolicy
extends Object
implements VerificationPolicy
    Default implementation of VerificationPolicy Contains rules for:
    1. verifying MIME type
    2. verifying signature
    3. verifying DocumentsManifest
    4. verifying ContainerDocuments
    5. verifying AnnotationsManifest
    6. verifying SingleAnnotationManifests
    7. verifying ContainerAnnotations
    May contain extra rules to add specialized verification requirements to the policy or to overwrite some of the pre-existing rules.
